title: Long history of controversies and punitive action against Dr Taware, arrested for changing blood sample of minor in Pune Porsche case
selftext: > Dr Ajay Taware was removed as medical superintendent of Pune’s B J Government Medical College twice, first over an alleged kidney transplant malpractice and later over a rat-bite incident.
